Conformance Criteria - All stainless-steel pipe is to be new with dimensions per ASME B36.19M and material in accordance with ASTM A312 Gr. TP316L.

Conformance Criteria - All stainless-steel pipe elbows shall be long radius butt weld pipe fittings to ASME B16.9.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Test results
Conformance Criteria - 100% visual scanning and; 5% radiography for workshop fabrication; 10% radiography for site welding.

○ Non-destructive examination of all welds shall be carried out in accordance with AS/NZS 1554.1 and AS/NZS 1554.6. Welding inspectors shall verify that fabrication/erection welding is performed in accordance with the requirements of the Specifications and the applicable Standards.
○ All weld inspections shall be performed by independent welding inspectors ed in accordance with AS 1554.1 and AS/NZS 1554.6.
Detail - Confirm pipes diameter, class & jointing type as shown on the drawings, and that the pipes are correct and in good condition.

Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Test results

Conformance Criteria - Pumps shall be Factory Performance Acceptance Tested in accordance with the requirements of Hydraulic Institute 14.6 and using grade 1U acceptance criteria for Rated flow, Total head and Efficiency.
○ Pumps shall also be Factory Performance Acceptance Tested for vibration in accordance with ISO 10816-7 Category II.
Detail - Stainless steel pipework, valves & fittings all installed as per approved drawings
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - As per approved shop drawings
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Gaskets shall be nitrile rubber, complying with WSA 109:2021
○ All bolts, nuts and washers shall be grade 316 stainless steel with factory applied “Molybond” coatings. Each bolt head shall be marked as A4-70 (rolled thread)

○ Where stainless steel bolts are connecting flanges of material other than stainless steel, the Contractor shall isolate the stainless steel bolt from the flange by the use of Delrin washers or equivalent approved washer to provide electrical isolation between the dissimilar metals. Interfaces between dissimilar metals shall be isolated with suitable flange isolating kits, as indicated on the drawings.

Conformance Criteria - Vibration testing shall be carried out on the installed pump and motor units on site in accordance with ISO 10816-7 Category II.
